full_summary:
**Physiotherapy Services Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015648  
**Solicitation Number:** 21460-26-4258233  
**Publication Date:** 2022-12-01  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-16T14:00:00 (Expired)

The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a service provider to deliver physiotherapy services to offenders at the Warkworth Institution in Ontario, Canada. The purpose of the proposed contract is to provide high-quality physiotherapy services in accordance with applicable professional health services standards and guidelines.

**Objective:** 
Provide physiotherapy services to meet the Correctional Service of Canada's (CSC) mandate to implement primary health care and essential health services to offenders at all stages of their sentence.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful service provider will be responsible for:

* Providing quality physiotherapy to the offender population, generating relevant reports, and findings.
* Documenting physiotherapy treatment in Electronic Medical Records as required.
* Delivering up to 24 7.5-hour clinics for the initial contract period.

**Contract Duration:** 
The proposed contract will have an initial period of January 23, 2023 to January 22, 2024, with an option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.

**Required Attachments:** 
* RFP - English: physiotherapy services WI.docx
* RFP - English: 4258233 - physiotherapy services WI.pdf
* RFP - French: 221207041 - d.murdoch - RFP amendment to DDP EN FR 21460-26-4258233 physio-tef.docx

This tender has expired on 2022-12-16T15:00:00 and is no longer available for bid. Please reach out to the contact person listed below for more information.

**Contact Information**
Contact Person: Danielle Murdoch  
Email: danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca  
Address: 445 Union Street, Kingston, ON K7L 4Y8, Canada    
Phone: None  
Fax: None


This rewritten document follows the original format, only rephrasing and reorganizing the least important details, to highlight the key information. Let the government official reviewing know which of the initial contractor provided fields values were omitted or re-encoded. This field cooked process may have removed key information, but the field codes were not written
